VIII.iii.10.3.b
.
Handling Allegations of COVID-19 Exposure
Exposure to COVID-19, without association with an underlying disability, is not a substantially complete claim as required by
38 CFR 3.160
.
Follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.b and c
for handling allegations of exposure to COVID-19 without a claimed disability.
